dialog: I can't tell if it's on or not.

but there are two or three of you assholes who don't listen.

Don't be frightened, baby, come on in.
Don't be frightened, baby, come on in.

That ain't so goddamn much. Hey.
I'm sorry, this booze'll blow your brains.  Get a brain transplant.

if you don't go home and get some shuteye.

to remember the words to the song.
to see if you still got something.

John Norman. Son of a bitch.

She's a big fan of yours.

but Sheila here, she really liked you, didn't you, Sheila?

you're the only girl I met with a last name.

I'm not that kind of girl.

and the business management and the expenses and the dues....

platinum platters played by Bebe Jesus.

walked in here with his hat in his hand.

because Bebe don't take no jive...

the star of our show, John Norman Howard Speedway.

and obey till death do us part" part?

and you got a sweet little ass, but I ain't going to.

here are Rita Coolidge and Tony Orlando.
